## WorkspaceComment.setEditable() method

Set whether this comment is editable or not.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setEditable(editable: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  editable | boolean | True if editable. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
